title: (a) Teapot And (b) Cover, ca. 1930
description: (a): Pot of blue-glazed porcelain, tapering toward top. Straight spout and four-sided handle set at right angle to it. Silver band at top and bottom and at onset of handle. (b): Flat silver cover with oval old ebony knob.

tombstone.epitaph: (a) Teapot And (b) Cover, ca. 1930. porcelain; silver and ebony. 1959-19-1-a,b.
